content:
It sounds like you're trying to locate your old Reebok CrossFit shoes, which you haven't seen since you switched to the Adidas Superstars.

Here's a suggestion: why not check your gym locker and see if they're still there? If you're not sure where you left them, you could also try asking a gym staff member or a friend if they've seen them.

If you're unable to find them, you might consider reaching out to the gym directly to see if anyone has turned them in or if they have a lost and found section where they might be stored.

Fingers crossed that you're able to track them down!
